location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

properties.description: Properties of the virtual network resource

count.description: Number of nodes in the agent pool. The default value is 1.

enableAutoScaling.description: Whether to enable auto-scaler. Default value is false

maxCount.description: The maximum number of nodes for auto-scaling

maxPods.description: The maximum number of pods that can run on a node.

minCount.description: The minimum number of nodes for auto-scaling

nodeLabels.description: The node labels to be persisted across all nodes in agent pool.

nodeTaints.description: Taints added to new nodes during node pool create and scale. For example, key=value:NoSchedule.

osSKU.description: Specifies the OS SKU used by the agent pool. The default is CBLMariner if OSType is Linux. The default is Windows2019 when OSType is Windows.

osType.description: The particular KubernetesVersion Image OS Type (Linux, Windows)

status.description: The observed status of the agent pool.

vmSize.description: The VM sku size of the agent pool node VMs.

errorMessage.description: Error messages during an agent pool operation or steady state.

count.description: Number of nodes in the agent pool. The default value is 1.

vmSize.description: The VM sku size of the agent pool node VMs.

infraNetworkProfile.description: The profile for the infrastructure networks used by the provisioned cluster

vnetSubnetIds.description: List of ARM resource Ids (maximum 1) for the infrastructure network object e.g. /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.AzureStackHCI/logicalNetworks/{logicalNetworkName}

authorizedIPRanges.description: IP Address or CIDR for SSH access to VMs in the provisioned cluster

controlPlaneEndpoint.description: IP Address of the Kubernetes API server

count.description: Number of control plane nodes. The default value is 1, and the count should be an odd number

vmSize.description: VM sku size of the control plane nodes

hostIP.description: IP address of the Kubernetes API server

name.description: ARM Id of the extended location.

type.description: The extended location type. Allowed value: 'CustomLocation'

publicKey.description: Onboarding public key for provisioning the Managed identity for the connected cluster.

resourceUid.description: Unique id of the parent provisioned cluster resource.

ssh.description: SSH configuration for VMs of the provisioned cluster.

publicKeys.description: The list of SSH public keys used to authenticate with VMs. A maximum of 1 key may be specified.

keyData.description: Certificate public key used to authenticate with VMs through SSH. The certificate must be in PEM format with or without headers.

count.description: Number of nodes in the agent pool. The default value is 1.

enableAutoScaling.description: Whether to enable auto-scaler. Default value is false

maxCount.description: The maximum number of nodes for auto-scaling

maxPods.description: The maximum number of pods that can run on a node.

minCount.description: The minimum number of nodes for auto-scaling

name.description: Unique name of the default agent pool in the context of the provisioned cluster. Default value is <clusterName>-nodepool1

nodeLabels.description: The node labels to be persisted across all nodes in agent pool.

nodeTaints.description: Taints added to new nodes during node pool create and scale. For example, key=value:NoSchedule.

osSKU.description: Specifies the OS SKU used by the agent pool. The default is CBLMariner if OSType is Linux. The default is Windows2019 when OSType is Windows.

osType.description: The particular KubernetesVersion Image OS Type (Linux, Windows)

vmSize.description: The VM sku size of the agent pool node VMs.

loadBalancerProfile.description: Profile of the HA Proxy load balancer.

networkPolicy.description: Network policy used for building Kubernetes network. Possible values include: 'calico'.

podCidr.description: A CIDR notation IP Address range from which to assign pod IPs.

count.description: Number of HA Proxy load balancer VMs. The default value is 0.

azureHybridBenefit.description: Indicates whether Azure Hybrid Benefit is opted in. Default value is false

agentPoolProfiles.description: The agent pool properties for the provisioned cluster.

autoScalerProfile.description: Parameters to be applied to the cluster-autoscaler when auto scaling is enabled for the provisioned cluster.

cloudProviderProfile.description: The profile for the underlying cloud infrastructure provider for the provisioned cluster.

clusterVMAccessProfile.description: The SSH restricted access profile for the VMs in the provisioned cluster.

controlPlane.description: The profile for control plane of the provisioned cluster.

kubernetesVersion.description: The version of Kubernetes in use by the provisioned cluster.

licenseProfile.description: The license profile of the provisioned cluster.

linuxProfile.description: The profile for Linux VMs in the provisioned cluster.

networkProfile.description: The network configuration profile for the provisioned cluster.

storageProfile.description: The storage configuration profile for the provisioned cluster.

expander.description: If not specified, the default is 'random'. See [expanders](https://github.com/kubernetes/autoscaler/blob/master/cluster-autoscaler/FAQ.md#what-are-expanders) for more information.

max-node-provision-time.description: The default is '15m'. Values must be an integer followed by an 'm'. No unit of time other than minutes (m) is supported.

max-total-unready-percentage.description: The default is 45. The maximum is 100 and the minimum is 0.

new-pod-scale-up-delay.description: For scenarios like burst/batch scale where you don't want CA to act before the kubernetes scheduler could schedule all the pods, you can tell CA to ignore unscheduled pods before they're a certain age. The default is '0s'. Values must be an integer followed by a unit ('s' for seconds, 'm' for minutes, 'h' for hours, etc).

ok-total-unready-count.description: This must be an integer. The default is 3.

scale-down-delay-after-add.description: The default is '10m'. Values must be an integer followed by an 'm'. No unit of time other than minutes (m) is supported.

scale-down-delay-after-delete.description: The default is the scan-interval. Values must be an integer followed by an 'm'. No unit of time other than minutes (m) is supported.

scale-down-delay-after-failure.description: The default is '3m'. Values must be an integer followed by an 'm'. No unit of time other than minutes (m) is supported.

scale-down-unneeded-time.description: The default is '10m'. Values must be an integer followed by an 'm'. No unit of time other than minutes (m) is supported.

scale-down-unready-time.description: The default is '20m'. Values must be an integer followed by an 'm'. No unit of time other than minutes (m) is supported.

scan-interval.description: The default is '10'. Values must be an integer number of seconds.

nfsCsiDriver.description: NFS CSI Driver settings for the storage profile.

smbCsiDriver.description: SMB CSI Driver settings for the storage profile.

enabled.description: Indicates whether to enable NFS CSI Driver. The default value is true.
Indicates whether to enable SMB CSI Driver. The default value is true.

name.description: ARM Id of the extended location.

type.description: The extended location type. Allowed value: 'CustomLocation'

dnsServers.description: List of DNS server IP Addresses associated with the network

gateway.description: IP Address of the Gateway associated with the network

ipAddressPrefix.description: IP Address Prefix of the network

vipPool.description: Range of IP Addresses for Kubernetes API Server and services if using HA Proxy load balancer

vlanID.description: VLAN Id used by the network

vmipPool.description: Range of IP Addresses for Kubernetes node VMs

hci.description: Infrastructure network profile for HCI platform

mocVnetName.description: Virtual Network name in MOC(Microsoft On-premises Cloud)

endIP.description: Ending IP address for the IP Pool

startIP.description: Starting IP address for the IP Pool

endIP.description: Ending IP address for the IP Pool

startIP.description: Starting IP address for the IP Pool

extendedLocation.description: Extended location pointing to the underlying infrastructure

properties.description: Properties of the agent pool resource
